dashboards_data.name: XSIAM SOC Value Metrics
dashboards_data.description: Actions taken by XSIAM for the SOC

data.phrase:
dataset = xsiam_playbookmetrics_raw
| alter Tasks = Tasks->[]
| arrayexpand Tasks

// TODO apply a datamodel to these two objects instead (Tasks and Alert)
| alter
taskState = tasks->state,
taskType = tasks->type,
taskId = tasks->id,
taskName = tasks->name,
scriptID = tasks->scriptId,
incidentID = alert->[0].parentXDRIncident,
alertID = alert->[0].id,
alertName = alert->name,
alertType = alert->type,
playbookId = alert->[0].playbookId

| filter taskType not in ("start", "title", "condition")
| filter scriptID != "" and scriptID != null


// Since the job which posts this data runs every 15 min there may be duplicate data the more frequent it is run

| alter dedupkey = concat(incidentID,taskId, alertID)
| dedup dedupkey


// Filter for just automation
//| filter alerttype != "Unclassified"
| filter taskState = "Completed"
| filter tasktype = "regular"
| alter ScriptID  =  if ( scriptID  ~= "^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[1-5][0-9a-f]{3}-[89abAB][0-9a-f]{3}-[0-9a-f]{12}$", "Custom", ScriptID )


//TODO make this a lookup table and join instead to make it scalable
| join type = inner (dataset = value_tags 
| filter Category != "use_case" and Time != "" and Time != null and ScriptID != "" and ScriptID != null
| fields Category as value_category, ScriptID as value_scriptid, `Tag` as value_tag, TaskName as value_taskname, Time as value_time
) as vt (scriptID contains vt.value_scriptid)
| fields value_category, value_scriptid, value_tag, value_taskname, value_time, _time 


| fields value_time , value_category
| alter soc_event_mintutes = to_integer(value_time )
| comp sum(soc_event_mintutes) as total_soc_minutes by value_category
| alter total_soc_hours = round(divide(total_soc_minutes,60))
| sort desc total_soc_minutes

















| view graph type = column subtype = grouped layout = horizontal show_callouts = `true` xaxis = value_category yaxis = total_soc_minutes,total_soc_hours seriescolor("total_soc_minutes","#23ae4f") seriescolor("total_soc_hours","#7cb5ec") xaxistitle = "Time" yaxistitle = "Category" seriestitle("total_soc_minutes","Total SOC Minutes") seriestitle("total_soc_hours","Total SOC Hours")

dataset = xsiam_playbookmetrics_raw
| alter Tasks = Tasks->[]
| arrayexpand Tasks

// TODO apply a datamodel to these two objects instead (Tasks and Alert)
| alter
taskState = tasks->state,
taskType = tasks->type,
taskId = tasks->id,
taskName = tasks->name,
scriptID = tasks->scriptId,
incidentID = alert->[0].parentXDRIncident,
alertID = alert->[0].id,
alertName = alert->name,
alertType = alert->type,
playbookId = alert->[0].playbookId

| filter taskType not in ("start", "title", "condition")
| filter scriptID != "" and scriptID != null


// Since the job which posts this data runs every 15 min there may be duplicate data the more frequent it is run

| alter dedupkey = concat(incidentID,taskId, alertID)
| dedup dedupkey


// Filter for just automation
//| filter alerttype != "Unclassified"
| filter taskState = "Completed"
| filter tasktype = "regular"
| alter ScriptID  =  if ( scriptID  ~= "^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[1-5][0-9a-f]{3}-[89abAB][0-9a-f]{3}-[0-9a-f]{12}$", "Custom", ScriptID )


//TODO make this a lookup table and join instead to make it scalable
| join type = inner (dataset = value_tags 
| filter Category != "use_case" and Time != "" and Time != null and ScriptID != "" and ScriptID != null
| fields Category as value_category, ScriptID as value_scriptid, `Tag` as value_tag, TaskName as value_taskname, Time as value_time
) as vt (scriptID contains vt.value_scriptid)
| fields value_category, value_scriptid, value_tag, value_taskname, value_time, _time 


| alter soc_event_minutes = to_integer(value_time)
| comp sum(soc_event_minutes) as total_soc_minutes by value_tag
| alter total_soc_hours = round(divide(total_soc_minutes , 60))
| fields value_tag  , total_soc_minutes  , total_soc_hours
| sort desc total_soc_minutes

















| view graph type = column subtype = grouped layout = horizontal show_callouts = `true` xaxis = value_tag yaxis = total_soc_minutes,total_soc_hours seriescolor("total_soc_hours","#7cb5ec") seriescolor("total_soc_minutes","#23ae4f") xaxistitle = "Time" yaxistitle = "Category" seriestitle("total_soc_minutes","Total SOC Minutes") seriestitle("total_soc_hours","Total SOC Hours")

dataset = xsiam_playbookmetrics_raw
| alter Tasks = Tasks->[]
| arrayexpand Tasks

// TODO apply a datamodel to these two objects instead (Tasks and Alert)
| alter
taskState = tasks->state,
taskType = tasks->type,
taskId = tasks->id,
taskName = tasks->name,
scriptID = tasks->scriptId,
incidentID = alert->[0].parentXDRIncident,
alertID = alert->[0].id,
alertName = alert->name,
alertType = alert->type,
playbookId = alert->[0].playbookId

| filter taskType not in ("start", "title", "condition")
| filter scriptID != "" and scriptID != null


// Since the job which posts this data runs every 15 min there may be duplicate data the more frequent it is run

| alter dedupkey = concat(incidentID,taskId, alertID)
| dedup dedupkey


// Filter for just automation
//| filter alerttype != "Unclassified"
| filter taskState = "Completed"
| filter tasktype = "regular"
| alter ScriptID  =  if ( scriptID  ~= "^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[1-5][0-9a-f]{3}-[89abAB][0-9a-f]{3}-[0-9a-f]{12}$", "Custom", ScriptID )


//TODO make this a lookup table and join instead to make it scalable
| join type = inner (dataset = value_tags 
| filter Category != "use_case" and Time != "" and Time != null and ScriptID != "" and ScriptID != null
| fields Category as value_category, ScriptID as value_scriptid, `Tag` as value_tag, TaskName as value_taskname, Time as value_time, Product as value_product, Vendor as value_vendor
) as vt (scriptID contains vt.value_scriptid)
| fields value_category, value_scriptid, value_tag, value_taskname, value_time, _time, value_product, value_vendor 


| alter soc_event_minutes = to_integer(value_time)
| comp sum(soc_event_minutes) as total_soc_minutes by value_product , value_vendor 
| alter total_soc_hours = round(divide(total_soc_minutes , 60))
| fields value_product , value_vendor , total_soc_minutes  , total_soc_hours
| sort desc total_soc_hours






















| view graph type = funnel header = "Most Used Vendors" show_callouts = `true` show_callouts_names = `true` xaxis = value_vendor yaxis = total_soc_hours

dataset = xsiam_playbookmetrics_raw
| alter Tasks = Tasks->[]
| arrayexpand Tasks

// TODO apply a datamodel to these two objects instead (Tasks and Alert)
| alter
taskState = tasks->state,
taskType = tasks->type,
taskId = tasks->id,
taskName = tasks->name,
scriptID = tasks->scriptId,
incidentID = alert->[0].parentXDRIncident,
alertID = alert->[0].id,
alertName = alert->name,
alertType = alert->type,
playbookId = alert->[0].playbookId

| filter taskType not in ("start", "title", "condition")
| filter scriptID != "" and scriptID != null


// Since the job which posts this data runs every 15 min there may be duplicate data the more frequent it is run

| alter dedupkey = concat(incidentID,taskId, alertID)
| dedup dedupkey


// Filter for just automation
//| filter alerttype != "Unclassified"
| filter taskState = "Completed"
| filter tasktype = "regular"
| alter ScriptID  =  if ( scriptID  ~= "^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[1-5][0-9a-f]{3}-[89abAB][0-9a-f]{3}-[0-9a-f]{12}$", "Custom", ScriptID )


//TODO make this a lookup table and join instead to make it scalable
| join type = inner (dataset = value_tags 
| filter Category != "use_case" and Time != "" and Time != null and ScriptID != "" and ScriptID != null
| fields Category as value_category, ScriptID as value_scriptid, `Tag` as value_tag, TaskName as value_taskname, Time as value_time, Product as value_product, Vendor as value_vendor
) as vt (scriptID contains vt.value_scriptid)
| fields value_category, value_scriptid, value_tag, value_taskname, value_time, _time, value_product, value_vendor 


| alter soc_event_minutes = to_integer(value_time)
| comp sum(soc_event_minutes) as total_soc_minutes by value_product, value_vendor 
| alter total_soc_hours = round(divide(total_soc_minutes , 60))
| fields value_product , value_vendor , total_soc_minutes  , total_soc_hours
| alter tool = concat(concat(value_vendor  , " "), value_product )
| sort desc total_soc_minutes

















| view graph type = pie subtype = full header = "Tool Usage in Hours" xaxis = tool yaxis = total_soc_hours

dataset = xsiam_playbookmetrics_raw
| alter Tasks = Tasks->[]
| arrayexpand Tasks

// TODO apply a datamodel to these two objects instead (Tasks and Alert)
| alter
taskState = tasks->state,
taskType = tasks->type,
taskId = tasks->id,
taskName = tasks->name,
scriptID = tasks->scriptId,
incidentID = alert->[0].parentXDRIncident,
alertID = alert->[0].id,
alertName = alert->name,
alertType = alert->type,
playbookId = alert->[0].playbookId

| filter taskType not in ("start", "title", "condition")
| filter scriptID != "" and scriptID != null


// Since the job which posts this data runs every 15 min there may be duplicate data the more frequent it is run

| alter dedupkey = concat(incidentID,taskId, alertID)
| dedup dedupkey


// Filter for just automation
//| filter alerttype != "Unclassified"
| filter taskState = "Completed"
| filter tasktype = "regular"
| alter ScriptID  =  if ( scriptID  ~= "^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[1-5][0-9a-f]{3}-[89abAB][0-9a-f]{3}-[0-9a-f]{12}$", "Custom", ScriptID )


//TODO make this a lookup table and join instead to make it scalable
| join type = inner (dataset = value_tags 
| filter Category != "use_case" and Time != "" and Time != null and ScriptID != "" and ScriptID != null
| fields Category as value_category, ScriptID as value_scriptid, `Tag` as value_tag, TaskName as value_taskname, Time as value_time
) as vt (scriptID contains vt.value_scriptid)
| fields value_category, value_scriptid, value_tag, value_taskname, value_time, _time 


| alter soc_event_minutes = to_integer(value_time)
| filter value_scriptid = "Custom"
| comp count() as tasknameCount by value_taskname 
| fields value_taskname , taskNameCount
| sort desc taskNameCount








| view graph type = pie subtype = full xaxis = taskName yaxis = taskNameCount legend_percentage = `true` seriestitle("taskNameCount","Custom Scripts Used")

dataset = xsiam_playbookmetrics_raw
| alter Tasks = Tasks->[]
| arrayexpand Tasks

// TODO apply a datamodel to these two objects instead (Tasks and Alert)
| alter
taskState = tasks->state,
taskType = tasks->type,
taskId = tasks->id,
taskName = tasks->name,
scriptID = tasks->scriptId,
incidentID = alert->[0].parentXDRIncident,
alertID = alert->[0].id,
alertName = alert->name,
alertType = alert->type,
playbookId = alert->[0].playbookId

| filter taskType not in ("start", "title", "condition")
| filter playbookId contains "" or playbookId contains null
| filter scriptID contains "" or scriptID contains null

// Filter for just automation
| filter taskState = "Completed"
| filter tasktype = "regular"


//TODO make this a lookup table and join instead to make it scalable
| join type = inner (dataset = value_tags 
| filter Category = "use_case"
| fields Category as value_category, ScriptID as value_scriptid, `Tag` as value_tag, TaskName as value_taskname, Time as value_time, PlaybookID as playbook_id
) as vt (playbookId contains vt.playbook_id)
| fields value_category, value_scriptid, value_tag, value_taskname, value_time, _time, playbook_id 

| fields value_time , value_tag , value_category
| alter soc_event_mintutes = to_integer(value_time)
| comp sum(soc_event_mintutes) as total_soc_minutes by value_tag
| alter total_soc_hours = divide(total_soc_minutes,60)
| sort desc total_soc_hours 






| view graph type = column subtype = grouped layout = horizontal header = "Use Case Time" xaxis = value_tag yaxis = total_soc_hours

dataset = xsiam_playbookmetrics_raw
| alter Tasks = Tasks->[]
| arrayexpand Tasks

// TODO apply a datamodel to these two objects instead (Tasks and Alert)
| alter
taskState = tasks->state,
taskType = tasks->type,
taskId = tasks->id,
taskName = tasks->name,
scriptID = tasks->scriptId,
incidentID = alert->[0].parentXDRIncident,
alertID = alert->[0].id,
alertName = alert->name,
alertType = alert->type,
playbookId = alert->[0].playbookId

| filter taskType not in ("start", "title", "condition")
| filter scriptID != "" and scriptID != null


// Since the job which posts this data runs every 15 min there may be duplicate data the more frequent it is run

| alter dedupkey = concat(incidentID,taskId, alertID)
| dedup dedupkey


// Filter for just automation
//| filter alerttype != "Unclassified"
| filter taskState = "Completed"
| filter tasktype = "regular"
| alter ScriptID  =  if ( scriptID  ~= "^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[1-5][0-9a-f]{3}-[89abAB][0-9a-f]{3}-[0-9a-f]{12}$", "Custom", ScriptID )


//TODO make this a lookup table and join instead to make it scalable
| join type = inner (dataset = value_tags 
| filter Category != "use_case" and Time != "" and Time != null and ScriptID != "" and ScriptID != null
| fields Category as value_category, ScriptID as value_scriptid, `Tag` as value_tag, TaskName as value_taskname, Time as value_time
) as vt (scriptID contains vt.value_scriptid)
| fields value_category, value_scriptid, value_tag, value_taskname, value_time, _time 


| alter soc_event_mintutes = to_integer(value_time)
| comp sum(soc_event_mintutes) as total_soc_minutes
| alter total_soc_hours = round(divide(total_soc_minutes,60))












| view graph type = single subtype = standard header = "Hours Saved by XSIAM" yaxis = total_soc_hours dataunit = "Hours" headcolor = "#f1f7f0" font = "Arial" headerfontsize = 6

config case_sensitive = false
| dataset = incidents 
| comp count_distinct(incident_id) as total_incidents
| alter incidents_per_day = round(divide(total_incidents, 7))
| alter incidents_per_hour = round(divide(incidents_per_day, 8))
| alter analyst_required = round(divide(incidents_per_hour, 13))
| alter analyst_required = if(analyst_required < 1, 1, analyst_required )




| view graph type = single subtype = standard yaxis = analyst_required

config case_sensitive = false
| dataset = incidents 
| filter status contains "new" or status contains "investigation"
| comp count_distinct(incident_id) as total_incidents
| alter incidents_per_day = round(divide(total_incidents, 7))
| alter incidents_per_hour = round(divide(incidents_per_day, 8))
| alter analyst_required = round(divide(incidents_per_hour, 13))
| alter analyst_required = if(analyst_required < 1, 1, analyst_required )



| view graph type = single subtype = standard yaxis = analyst_required

dataset = alerts 
| arrayexpand original_tags
| filter original_tags contains "DS:"
// Total Alerts
| comp count_distinct(alert_id) as total_alerts by original_tags 
| sort desc total_alerts








| view graph type = column subtype = grouped layout = horizontal header = "Total Alerts" xaxis = original_tags yaxis = total_alerts xaxistitle = "Alerts" yaxistitle = "Data Sources" seriestitle("total_alerts","Alerts by Data Source")

dataset = alerts 
// Total Alerts
| comp count_distinct(alert_id) as total_alerts by alert_source 
| sort desc total_alerts


| view graph type = pie show_callouts = `true` show_callouts_names = `true` xaxis = alert_source yaxis = total_alerts

dataset = incidents  
| filter (status  = ENUM.RESOLVED_OTHER and (resolve_comment = "Resolved by the Auto Triage Job")) or status = ENUM.RESOLVED_AUTO_RESOLVE or status = ENUM.RESOLVED_AUTO_RESOLVE
| comp count_distinct(incident_id) as total_incidents  
| sort desc total_incidents


| view graph type = single subtype = standard yaxis = total_incidents

dataset = incidents  
| filter (status  = ENUM.RESOLVED_OTHER and (resolve_comment = "Resolved by the Auto Triage Job")) or status = ENUM.RESOLVED_AUTO_RESOLVE or status = ENUM.RESOLVED_AUTO_RESOLVE
| comp count_distinct(incident_id) as total_incidents  
| sort desc total_incidents
| view graph type = single subtype = standard yaxis = total_incidents

dataset = incidents  
| filter (status  = ENUM.NEW  or status = ENUM.UNDER_INVESTIGATION)
| comp count_distinct(incident_id) as total_incidents  
| sort desc total_incidents


| view graph type = single subtype = standard yaxis = total_incidents

dataset = incidents  
| filter (status  = ENUM.NEW  or status = ENUM.UNDER_INVESTIGATION)
| filter starred = 1
| comp count_distinct(incident_id) as total_incidents  
| sort desc total_incidents



| view graph type = single subtype = standard yaxis = total_incidents

widgets_data.title: Time Saved by XSIAM per Task

data.phrase:
dataset = xsiam_playbookmetrics_raw
| alter Tasks = Tasks->[]
| arrayexpand Tasks

// TODO apply a datamodel to these two objects instead (Tasks and Alert)
| alter
taskState = tasks->state,
taskType = tasks->type,
taskId = tasks->id,
taskName = tasks->name,
scriptID = tasks->scriptId,
incidentID = alert->[0].parentXDRIncident,
alertID = alert->[0].id,
alertName = alert->name,
alertType = alert->type,
playbookId = alert->[0].playbookId

| filter taskType not in ("start", "title", "condition")
| filter scriptID != "" and scriptID != null


// Since the job which posts this data runs every 15 min there may be duplicate data the more frequent it is run

| alter dedupkey = concat(incidentID,taskId, alertID)
| dedup dedupkey


// Filter for just automation
//| filter alerttype != "Unclassified"
| filter taskState = "Completed"
| filter tasktype = "regular"
| alter ScriptID  =  if ( scriptID  ~= "^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[1-5][0-9a-f]{3}-[89abAB][0-9a-f]{3}-[0-9a-f]{12}$", "Custom", ScriptID )


//TODO make this a lookup table and join instead to make it scalable
| join type = inner (dataset = value_tags 
| filter Category != "use_case" and Time != "" and Time != null and ScriptID != "" and ScriptID != null
| fields Category as value_category, ScriptID as value_scriptid, `Tag` as value_tag, TaskName as value_taskname, Time as value_time
) as vt (scriptID contains vt.value_scriptid)
| fields value_category, value_scriptid, value_tag, value_taskname, value_time, _time 


| alter soc_event_minutes = to_integer(value_time)
| comp sum(soc_event_minutes) as total_soc_minutes by value_tag
| alter total_soc_hours = round(divide(total_soc_minutes , 60))
| fields value_tag  , total_soc_minutes  , total_soc_hours
| sort desc total_soc_minutes

















| view graph type = column subtype = grouped layout = horizontal show_callouts = `true` xaxis = value_tag yaxis = total_soc_minutes,total_soc_hours seriescolor("total_soc_hours","#7cb5ec") seriescolor("total_soc_minutes","#23ae4f") xaxistitle = "Time" yaxistitle = "Category" seriestitle("total_soc_minutes","Total SOC Minutes") seriestitle("total_soc_hours","Total SOC Hours")

widgets_data.title: Tools used by XSIAM by Hour
widgets_data.description: Which tools is XSIAM uniquely automating most of the time by number of hours

data.phrase:
dataset = xsiam_playbookmetrics_raw
| alter Tasks = Tasks->[]
| arrayexpand Tasks

// TODO apply a datamodel to these two objects instead (Tasks and Alert)
| alter
taskState = tasks->state,
taskType = tasks->type,
taskId = tasks->id,

incidentID = alert->[0].parentXDRIncident,
alertID = alert->[0].id,
alertName = alert->name,
alertType = alert->type,
playbookId = alert->[0].playbookId

// Since the job which posts this data runs every 15 min there may be duplicate data the more frequent it is run

| alter tool = concat(concat(value_vendor  , " "), value_product )

| view graph type = pie subtype = full header = "Tool Usage in Hours" xaxis = tool yaxis = total_soc_hours

//TODO make this a lookup table and join instead to make it scalable
| join type = inner (dataset = value_tags 
| filter Category != "use_case" and Time != "" and Time != null and ScriptID != "" and ScriptID != null
| fields Category as value_category, ScriptID as value_scriptid, `Tag` as value_tag, TaskName as value_taskname, Time as value_time
) as vt (scriptID contains vt.value_scriptid)
| fields value_category, value_scriptid, value_tag, value_taskname, value_time, _time 


| alter soc_event_mintutes = to_integer(value_time)
| comp sum(soc_event_mintutes) as total_soc_minutes
| alter total_soc_hours = round(divide(total_soc_minutes,60))












| view graph type = single subtype = standard header = "Hours Saved by XSIAM" yaxis = total_soc_hours dataunit = "Hours" headcolor = "#f1f7f0" font = "Arial" headerfontsize = 6

widgets_data.title: XSIAM Vendor Usage
widgets_data.description: Which Vendors are being most often automated by XSIAM.

data.phrase:
dataset = xsiam_playbookmetrics_raw
| alter Tasks = Tasks->[]
| arrayexpand Tasks

// TODO apply a datamodel to these two objects instead (Tasks and Alert)
| alter
taskState = tasks->state,
taskType = tasks->type,
taskId = tasks->id,
taskName = tasks->name,
scriptID = tasks->scriptId,
incidentID = alert->[0].parentXDRIncident,
alertID = alert->[0].id,
alertName = alert->name,
alertType = alert->type,
playbookId = alert->[0].playbookId

| filter taskType not in ("start", "title", "condition")
| filter scriptID != "" and scriptID != null


// Since the job which posts this data runs every 15 min there may be duplicate data the more frequent it is run

| alter dedupkey = concat(incidentID,taskId, alertID)
| dedup dedupkey


// Filter for just automation
//| filter alerttype != "Unclassified"
| filter taskState = "Completed"
| filter tasktype = "regular"
| alter ScriptID  =  if ( scriptID  ~= "^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[1-5][0-9a-f]{3}-[89abAB][0-9a-f]{3}-[0-9a-f]{12}$", "Custom", ScriptID )


//TODO make this a lookup table and join instead to make it scalable
| join type = inner (dataset = value_tags 
| filter Category != "use_case" and Time != "" and Time != null and ScriptID != "" and ScriptID != null
| fields Category as value_category, ScriptID as value_scriptid, `Tag` as value_tag, TaskName as value_taskname, Time as value_time, Product as value_product, Vendor as value_vendor
) as vt (scriptID contains vt.value_scriptid)
| fields value_category, value_scriptid, value_tag, value_taskname, value_time, _time, value_product, value_vendor 


| alter soc_event_minutes = to_integer(value_time)
| comp sum(soc_event_minutes) as total_soc_minutes by value_product , value_vendor 
| alter total_soc_hours = round(divide(total_soc_minutes , 60))
| fields value_product , value_vendor , total_soc_minutes  , total_soc_hours
| sort desc total_soc_hours






















| view graph type = funnel header = "Most Used Vendors" show_callouts = `true` show_callouts_names = `true` xaxis = value_vendor yaxis = total_soc_hours

widgets_data.title: Total Alerts By Source
widgets_data.description: How many alerts are native XSIAM alerts

data.phrase:
dataset = alerts 
// Total Alerts
| comp count_distinct(alert_id) as total_alerts by alert_source 
| sort desc total_alerts


| view graph type = pie show_callouts = `true` show_callouts_names = `true` xaxis = alert_source yaxis = total_alerts

widgets_data.title: Total Alerts
widgets_data.description: All alerts firing by alert type

data.phrase:
dataset = alerts 
| arrayexpand original_tags
| filter original_tags contains "DS:"
// Total Alerts
| comp count_distinct(alert_id) as total_alerts by original_tags 
| sort desc total_alerts








| view graph type = column subtype = grouped layout = horizontal header = "Total Alerts" xaxis = original_tags yaxis = total_alerts xaxistitle = "Alerts" yaxistitle = "Data Sources" seriestitle("total_alerts","Alerts by Data Source")

dataset = xsiam_playbookmetrics_raw
| alter Tasks = Tasks->[]
| arrayexpand Tasks

// TODO apply a datamodel to these two objects instead (Tasks and Alert)
| alter
taskState = tasks->state,
taskType = tasks->type,
taskId = tasks->id,
taskName = tasks->name,
scriptID = tasks->scriptId,
incidentID = alert->[0].parentXDRIncident,
alertID = alert->[0].id,
alertName = alert->name,
alertType = alert->type,
playbookId = alert->[0].playbookId

| filter taskType not in ("start", "title", "condition")
| filter scriptID != "" and scriptID != null


// Since the job which posts this data runs every 15 min there may be duplicate data the more frequent it is run

| alter dedupkey = concat(incidentID,taskId, alertID)
| dedup dedupkey


// Filter for just automation
//| filter alerttype != "Unclassified"
| filter taskState = "Completed"
| filter tasktype = "regular"
| alter ScriptID  =  if ( scriptID  ~= "^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[1-5][0-9a-f]{3}-[89abAB][0-9a-f]{3}-[0-9a-f]{12}$", "Custom", ScriptID )


//TODO make this a lookup table and join instead to make it scalable
| join type = inner (dataset = value_tags 
| filter Category != "use_case" and Time != "" and Time != null and ScriptID != "" and ScriptID != null
| fields Category as value_category, ScriptID as value_scriptid, `Tag` as value_tag, TaskName as value_taskname, Time as value_time
) as vt (scriptID contains vt.value_scriptid)
| fields value_category, value_scriptid, value_tag, value_taskname, value_time, _time 


| alter soc_event_minutes = to_integer(value_time)
| filter value_scriptid = "Custom"
| comp count() as tasknameCount by value_taskname 
| fields value_taskname , taskNameCount
| sort desc taskNameCount








| view graph type = pie subtype = full xaxis = taskName yaxis = taskNameCount legend_percentage = `true` seriestitle("taskNameCount","Custom Scripts Used")

widgets_data.title: Common Use Cases
widgets_data.description: Which Use Cases are most often being executed

data.phrase:
dataset = xsiam_playbookmetrics_raw
| alter Tasks = Tasks->[]
| arrayexpand Tasks

// TODO apply a datamodel to these two objects instead (Tasks and Alert)
| alter
taskState = tasks->state,
taskType = tasks->type,
taskId = tasks->id,
taskName = tasks->name,
scriptID = tasks->scriptId,
incidentID = alert->[0].parentXDRIncident,
alertID = alert->[0].id,
alertName = alert->name,
alertType = alert->type,
playbookId = alert->[0].playbookId

| filter taskType not in ("start", "title", "condition")
| filter playbookId contains "" or playbookId contains null
| filter scriptID contains "" or scriptID contains null

// Filter for just automation
| filter taskState = "Completed"
| filter tasktype = "regular"


//TODO make this a lookup table and join instead to make it scalable
| join type = inner (dataset = value_tags 
| filter Category = "use_case"
| fields Category as value_category, ScriptID as value_scriptid, `Tag` as value_tag, TaskName as value_taskname, Time as value_time, PlaybookID as playbook_id
) as vt (playbookId contains vt.playbook_id)
| fields value_category, value_scriptid, value_tag, value_taskname, value_time, _time, playbook_id 

| fields value_time , value_tag , value_category
| alter soc_event_mintutes = to_integer(value_time)
| comp sum(soc_event_mintutes) as total_soc_minutes by value_tag
| alter total_soc_hours = divide(total_soc_minutes,60)
| sort desc total_soc_hours 






| view graph type = column subtype = grouped layout = horizontal header = "Use Case Time" xaxis = value_tag yaxis = total_soc_hours

widgets_data.title: Incidents Auto Resolved
widgets_data.description: This includes deduping (Palo SOC Framework), auto triage, and auto-resolution by XSIAM

data.phrase:
dataset = incidents  
| filter (status  = ENUM.RESOLVED_OTHER and (resolve_comment = "Resolved by the Auto Triage Job")) or status = ENUM.RESOLVED_AUTO_RESOLVE or status = ENUM.RESOLVED_AUTO_RESOLVE
| comp count_distinct(incident_id) as total_incidents  
| sort desc total_incidents
| view graph type = single subtype = standard yaxis = total_incidents

dataset = incidents  
| filter (status  = ENUM.RESOLVED_OTHER and (resolve_comment = "Resolved by the Auto Triage Job")) or status = ENUM.RESOLVED_AUTO_RESOLVE or status = ENUM.RESOLVED_AUTO_RESOLVE
| comp count_distinct(incident_id) as total_incidents  
| sort desc total_incidents


| view graph type = single subtype = standard yaxis = total_incidents

dataset = incidents  
| filter (status  = ENUM.NEW  or status = ENUM.UNDER_INVESTIGATION)
| comp count_distinct(incident_id) as total_incidents  
| sort desc total_incidents


| view graph type = single subtype = standard yaxis = total_incidents

dataset = incidents  
| filter (status  = ENUM.NEW  or status = ENUM.UNDER_INVESTIGATION)
| filter starred = 1
| comp count_distinct(incident_id) as total_incidents  
| sort desc total_incidents



| view graph type = single subtype = standard yaxis = total_incidents

widgets_data.title: Analysts Required post-XSIAM (EPH 8 to 13)
widgets_data.description: Given the total number of manual incidents post-XSIAM and using the Palo SOC benchmark of 8 to 13 events per hour per analyst, how many analysts would be required to handle all incidents?

data.phrase:
config case_sensitive = false
| dataset = incidents 
| filter status contains "new" or status contains "investigation"
| comp count_distinct(incident_id) as total_incidents
| alter incidents_per_day = round(divide(total_incidents, 7))
| alter incidents_per_hour = round(divide(incidents_per_day, 8))
| alter analyst_required = round(divide(incidents_per_hour, 13))
| alter analyst_required = if(analyst_required < 1, 1, analyst_required )



| view graph type = single subtype = standard yaxis = analyst_required

widgets_data.title: Analysts Required NO XSIAM (EPH 8 to 13)
widgets_data.description: Given the total number of manual incidents and using the Palo SOC benchmark of 8 to 13 events per hour per analyst, how many analysts would be required to handle all incidents?

data.phrase:
config case_sensitive = false
| dataset = incidents 
| comp count_distinct(incident_id) as total_incidents
| alter incidents_per_day = round(divide(total_incidents, 7))
| alter incidents_per_hour = round(divide(incidents_per_day, 8))
| alter analyst_required = round(divide(incidents_per_hour, 13))
| alter analyst_required = if(analyst_required < 1, 1, analyst_required )




| view graph type = single subtype = standard yaxis = analyst_required
